webdevsection.title: Web Development
webdevsection.desc: Specialized in modern technologies, I develop high-performance websites and applications using Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS. My expertise ranges from responsive design to SEO optimization, including smooth animations and intuitive user interfaces.
webdevsection.desc2: I build scalable web solutions that adapt perfectly to all devices, with a special focus on accessibility and performance. For each project, I apply best practices in modern front-end development to ensure an exceptional user experience.

photographysection.title: Photography
photographysection.desc: Photography is for me the art of capturing emotion and telling a story. Specialized in sports, portraits, weddings, landscapes, and architecture, I capture authentic moments with an approach that combines technique and artistic sensitivity, for natural and timeless images.

designsection.title: Design
designsection.desc: I created two books showcasing five months of adventure in Southeast Asia, using my own photos and writing. Self-edited and sold over 500 copies, this experience taught me consistency in design and how to manage large-scale projects effectively.

about.title: About me
about.desc:
Creative web developer and professional photographer, I combine technical expertise and artistic sensitivity in a unique approach. My background has given me a keen eye for detail that I apply to both code and imagery. As a freelancer, I adapt to the specific needs of each project, blending technical performance with visual impact to deliver results that exceed expectations.

In development, I master modern technologies to create elegant, high-performance interfaces. My dual experience allows me to offer comprehensive web solutions where every element is thoughtfully designed. In photography, I capture the essence of diverse worlds: urban landscapes, sports, events, and weddings. This practice constantly enriches my creativity and influences my web design approach.
